verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Blessed be the Lord God,
The God of Israel.
Blessed be the Lord God,
The God of Israel.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who only doeth wondrous things,
Who only doeth wondrous things,
blessed be Thy glorious name forever.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let the whole earth be filled
With His glory, Amen,
Amen, Amen, and Amen.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Blessed be the Lord God,
The God of Israel.
Blessed be the Lord God
The God of Israel.
